content.raw:
It should be pretty easy to transform between different frames, so I don't think there's a need to change the code again. As far as now though, this is the only place I've definitively seen the frames confirmed (I believe there was some Gazebo Answers comment that might have also stated this, but it was unclear if that refered to the current 2.2 codebase).  So, it would probably be helpful to others to put this on the User Guide.

Other outstanding issues with this:

1.  Still unclear why the values for the hands sensors keep changing values wildly when no motion is occurring.  This doesn't just seem like noise like with the feet, it seems like most numbers are random (only z seems relatively constant).

2. The User guide mentions that the feet sensors will only be 3-axis in the 
competition.  Will this be torques, forces or some combination?
